snippet: It’s hard to exaggerate the far-reaching effect of Title IX on American society. Here are a few of the landmarks along the timeline of women in sports, before and after the passage of the law.
lead_paragraph: It’s hard to exaggerate the far-reaching effect of Title IX on American society. Here are a few of the landmarks along the timeline of women in sports, before and after the passage of the law.

headline.main: Before and After Title IX: Women in Sports
